descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/2Zj2sPB.png[/img][/center][center]My first reupload!

A reupload of quechus9's AC 3 bow and arrow. Thanks for giving me the permission! :D
Huge props to him! Thank you!
(Check out his other mods on the Steam Workshop)

The bow and arrows of Assassin's Creed 3, with custom meshes and textures! It can be found in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun. Bow can be found upstairs in a chest called "Master Chest" and arrows can be bought from the owner of the shop. These items are not overpowered, just for those who think they are .-.


And please don't upload this file to any other site unless you get his permission.
[/center]
[center]Thank you!Â [/center]

I have MY FIRST EVER mod coming soon, (4 and a half months to try and make a mod is a torture :/ ) with custom meshes and textures!

So here's a little hint ;)

"Yo ho, yo ho, yo ho, an assassin's life for me!"
author: quechus9
